query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_description,
  SUM(CASE WHEN specifications IS NOT NULL AND specifications != '' AND specifications != '{}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_specifications,
  SUM(CASE WHEN verified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as verified_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN catalogUrl IS NOT NULL AND catalogUrl != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_url
FROM products 
WHERE brand = 'Thermo Fisher Scientific';
